original_text: So Solomon overlaid the house within with pure gold: and he made a partition by the chains of gold before the oracle; and he overlaid it with gold.
korean_text: 솔로몬이 정금으로 외소 안에 입히고 내소 앞에 금사슬로 건너지르고 내소를 금으로 입히고

sentences.original_text: So Solomon overlaid the house within with pure gold
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 솔로몬은 성전 내부를 순금으로 입혔다

sentences.original_text: and he made a partition by the chains of gold
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 황금 사슬로 칸막이를 만들었다

sentences.original_text: and he overlaid it with gold
